title: As good as expected
text: Nowadays, is really rare to find a turistic destination that is above expectations, and Acropolis is one of them. Not Athens, only Acropolis. Astonishingly beautiful.

title: Amazing location, poor food, quite expensive
text: The location is really good. The terrace is quite lovely and it's almost worth the poor value for money (relation between food and price).

title: Amazing food
text: Good service, not bad location but the food... high level. Very very good. We specially recomend the "Wasaby creamy Dragon roll ". It Is impressive.

title: Great food, great service and excellent experience
text: They really look for innovation in their dishes and the service is really good. Great location and experience.
